statements: SELECT * FROM FleetVehicles WHERE vehicle_status = TRUE;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM FleetVehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM FleetVehicles ORDER BY gps_timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location_lat > 40 AND location_lat < 50;
SELECT * FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location_long <> 0 ORDER BY location_long ASC;
SELECT * FROM FleetVehicles WHERE vehicle_status = TRUE;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location_lat > 40;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, gps_timestamp FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location_lat < 40 AND vehicle_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location_lat BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY gps_timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name AS name, location_lat AS latitude, location_long AS longitude FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location_long < -70 ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, status FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE status='Active';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, gps_data FROM fleet_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -70.0;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT vehicle_id, gps_data FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_name LIKE 'Truck%';
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, status FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, status, vehicle_id FROM fleet_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, gps_data->'speed' AS speed FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
SELECT vehicle_id, status, timestamp FROM vehicle_status_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, status FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_name LIKE 'Car%';
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_name, gps_data FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM vehicle_status_history WHERE status = 'Maintenance');
SELECT vh.vehicle_id, vh.timestamp, vh.status FROM vehicle_status_history vh JOIN fleet_vehicles fv ON vh.vehicle_id = fv.vehicle_id WHERE fv.status = 'Inactive';
SELECT * FROM vehicles
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_id DESC
SELECT trip_id, start_time, end_time, distance FROM trips WHERE distance > 100
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles;
SELECT driver_name, contact_number, license_number, vehicle_name FROM drivers INNER JOIN vehicles ON drivers.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT trip_id, start_time, end_time, distance FROM trips WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM gps_data WHERE location_lat < 40 AND location_long > -80;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location, status FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE status = 'Inactive';
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location, status FROM fleet_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE current_location LIKE 'City%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, current_location FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location, status FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE status = 'available' AND current_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM gps_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vh.vehicle_id, vh.location, vs.status_name FROM vehicle_history vh JOIN vehicle_status vs ON vh.status = vs.status_name WHERE vh.event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
